analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x49dd5497a4947d0202c7a110ab6539d4ba21e53a.sol:
	Contract GWGSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x49dd5497a4947d0202c7a110ab6539d4ba21e53a.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x49dd5497a4947d0202c7a110ab6539d4ba21e53a.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
